name: Rooflogic Xtreme Fibertite Roofing System AWL
template name: Rooflogic Xtreme Fibertite Roofing System AWL

name: Pre Start
Area Accessible
Edge protection in place
Structure and substrate has been handed over by LTM. No check of falls by SWP
Max weight load on roof per pack is 500kg
Base Deck
Base deck installed as per agreed scope with lts
All penetration boxes and pipes to be installed through the base deck
Approved fixings used 12 -14x20 class 4 steelteks with neos
Base deck screwed off at every purlin and every pan
Base deck stiched along side-laps at 300mm centres
VCL
Is the substrate clean, dry clear of swarf
All areas covered and sheets lapped 100mm min
All holes/penetrations patched and watertight
Stonewool 150mm Insulation above VCL
Surface is dry prior to install
VCL has been checked for no damage (100x100 patch)
Joints flush (no gaps between stonewool)
Gutter edge flashing installed
Roof board HDP mechanically fixed
Surface is dry prior to install
Roof boards Installed tight and in brick pattern
Correct length screw with load washer min 20mm penetration into base deck
Insulation Board installed tight and no gaps
Installed as per wind uplift fixing plan
ILD system
Conductive continuity mesh installed
Roof board HDP Adhered with 600 board bond glue
Roof boards Installed tight and in brick pattern
Correct glue Armac 600u
Glue Installed as per suppliers specification Spray Armac 600u Board Bond 30mm wide beads continuously as 100mm centres.
Installed insulation to be covered with fibretite membrane in the same day
Any damaged board to be replaced with a full new board
Fibertite
Surface clean and free from debris, no excess moisture
Adhesive installed to substrate the width of the roll
Laying of membrane into the adhesive and Correct glue Armac 400u
Laping on adjacent membrane to be minimum of 75mm
Broom/weighted rolling of membrane into adhesive
Wipe and clean of laps prior to welding
Test weld with welding machine
Probe of seam with QA hook
ILD test
Pipe penetrations
150mm minimum upstand
RL E-101 Sealant applied as per specifications
Clamped with stainless steel hose clamp
Fiberclad Flashings
Installed correctly according to specifications
Fixings and welding done according to specifications and details
Probe of weld with QA hook
Review and Sign off
All installation work complete, checked and reviewed as per specification
LT Mcguiness project manager sign off
Sign off
Parapets AWL
Pre Start
Area Accessible
Edge protection in place
Structure and substrate has been handed over by LTM. No check of falls by SWP

Approved fixings used 12-14x20 class 4 steelteks with neos
Base deck screwed off at every purlin and every pan
Base deck stitched along side-laps at 300mm centres
VCL
Is the substrate clean, dry clear of swarf
Plywood parapet upstand joints flush and moisture under 18%
All areas covered and sheets lapped 100mm min
All holes/penetrations patched and watertight
Stonewool 150mm Insulation above VCL
Surface is dry prior to install
VCL has been checked for no damage (100x100 patch)
Joints flush (no gaps between stonewool)
Gutter edge flashing installed
Roof board HDP mechanically fixed
Surface is dry prior to install
Roof boards Installed tight and in brick pattern
Correct length screw with load washer min 20mm penetration into base deck and plywood upstand
Insulation Board installed tight and no gaps
Any damaged board to be replaced with a full new board
Installed insulation to be covered with fibretite membrane in the same day
Installed as per wind uplift fixing plan
ILD system
Conductive continuity mesh installed
Fibertite
Surface clean and free from debris, no excess moisture
Adhesive installed to substrate the width of the roll
Laying of membrane into parapet upstand with 220 glue
Laying of membrane into the adhesive and Correct glue Armac 400u
Laping on adjacent membrane to be minimum of 75mm
Broom/weighted rolling of membrane into adhesive
Wipe and clean of laps prior to welding with acetone
Test weld with welding machine
Probe of seam with QA hook
ILD test
Fiberclad Flashings
Installed correctly according to specifications

Probe of weld with QA hook
Review and Sign off

LT Mcguiness project manager sign off
Sign off
